name: MagiQuest: Forgotten Realms
description:
In 2010, Cyan Worlds and Creative Kingdoms LLC published an online game called "MagiQuest Online". Based on the successful real-life roleplaying game, players were able to explore the Twisted Woods, Clan Courtyard and Portal Well realms and had to solve various puzzles and collect valuable items... and ultimately fight a huge stone golem!

Since 2012, this original game is no longer available as Cyan Worlds shut down the servers. "Forgotten Realms" is a partial offline reconstruction in the Unity engine of that original online game.

In this reconstruction i am using 99% original assets made by Cyan Worlds. No copyright infringement is intended and it is made clear that Cyan and Creative Kingdoms LLC own all rights to MagiQuest and MagiQuest Online.

Right now it does not feature any quests or puzzles the original had, but those might be added in a future update. It is more of a walking simulator with limited interactivity which i hope gives you a feeling for what MQO looked like back in the day.
